DOC.brief_title: Long-term Follow-up Study Safety Maintenance Efficacy ATX-101
DOC.detailed_description: In study , patient complete randomized , double-blind , placebo-controlled phase 3 study ATX-101-10-16 ATX-101-10-17 recruited German study sit followed-up 2 year . No study medication administer study .
DOC.criteria: Signed write informed consent studyrelated activity carry Any subject successfully complete final visit ( visit 7 ) phase 3 clinical trial , ATX1011016 ATX1011017 reduction submental fat , i.e . subject must least one study treatment administer complete predecessor study visit 7 Willingness comply schedule procedure study Subjects , since completion prior phase 3 study ATX1011016 ATX1011017 , undergo treatment may affect evaluation submental area ( e.g . limited longterm treatment systemic corticosteroid , liposuction , surgery lipolytic treatment submental area , treatment radio frequency , laser procedure , chemical peel , dermal filler neck chin area botulinum toxin injection neck chin area )
